agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Water & Rural Affairs TIME & DATE: 11:00 AM or upon adjournment Monday, April 15, 2019 PLACE: E1.012 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Charles Perry SB 516 Zaffirini Relating to registration as an organ donor and a voluntary contribution to the organ donor registry when applying for a hunting or fishing license. SB 948 Kolkhorst Relating to release sites for breeder deer. SB 1386 Watson Relating to the authority of the Texas Water Development Board to consider certain financial matters in a closed meeting. SB 2026 Perry Relating to regulation of the production of retail public utility wells by a groundwater conservation district. SB 2027 Perry Relating to the standard of judicial review for a suit involving a groundwater conservation district. SB 2126 Creighton | et al. Relating to taking sand, gravel, marl, shell, and mudshell from Texas rivers. SB 2272 Nichols | et al. Relating to the procedure for amending or revoking certificates of public convenience and necessity issued to certain water utilities. SB 2332 Creighton Relating to reporting to the legislature by certain river authorities. SB 2334 Creighton Relating to grants awarded to nonprofit food banks for disaster response. SB 2452 Lucio | et al. Relating to the provision by the Texas Water Development Board of financial assistance for the development of certain projects in economically distressed areas. SB 2507 Taylor Relating to the territory, powers, and administration of the Gulf Coast Water Authority. SCR 2 Flores Recognizing the game wardens of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department as the "Texas Navy" and commending them for their service to the Lone Star State. SJR 79 Lucio | et al. Proposing a constitutional amendment providing for the issuance of additional general obligation bonds by the Texas Water Development Board to provide financial assistance for the development of certain projects in economically distressed areas. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
